title: Investigate Missing Package
description: A customer reports their package was marked as 'Delivered' by the carrier, but they never received it.

tasks.description: Retrieve the order details and the carrier's tracking information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the tracking status is 'Delivered'.

tasks.description: Check for detailed delivery information, such as a photo of the delivery location or GPS coordinates from the carrier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a proof-of-delivery photo showing the package at the correct address.

tasks.description: Advise the customer to check around their property and with neighbors, and if still not found, initiate a 'lost package' claim with the carrier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides helpful advice and correctly starts the carrier claim process.
